title: Deep Convolutional Neural Network Enhanced Non-uniform Fast Fourier Transform for Undersampled MRI Reconstruction
details: Y Li, H Qi, Z Hu, H Sun, G Li, Z Zhang, Y Liu, H Guo… - International Journal of …, 2025
abstract: NUFFT is widely used in MRI reconstruction, offering a balance of efficiency and accuracy. However, it struggles with uneven or sparse sampling, leading to unacceptable under sampling errors. To address this, we introduced DCNUFFT, a …
